title: Adarsh Institute of Technology and Research Centre: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placements, Rankings
meta_description: Adarsh Institute of Technology and Research Centre Admission 2024 is open for various degree programs based on MHT CET entrance exams and Maharashtra CAP Counselling. Check latest updates and news on Adarsh Institute of Technology and Research CentreAdmission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Eligibility, and Admission Process

Section.name: About AITRC
Section.description: AIT aims at bringing out a leader, globally competent, innovative and geared to drive the future, out of each student enrolled. And to meet this aim the institute has strategically fortified its position as a pioneer in educational technology, designed in-demand technical programs and curriculum, has brought in a team of competent ,renowned and dedicated staff, well equipped digital research labs, secure wireless network access been provided to all students, faculty, and staff from any location on the Tech campus, the institute has developed and maintained a communication and data network that is comparable to that of the most innovative institutions, a hi-tech and vibrant campus and building with enthuses a innovative learning environment, all the more the campus is studded with the best hostel facility, making learning all the more thrilling and inviting.
